mdRecord.dcterms:title: To the voters of the Second Congressional District: comprising the counties of Isle of Wight, Nansemond, Southampton, Sussex, Surry, Greensville, Norfolk and Princess Anne, and the cities of Norfolk and Portsmouth / Sam'l. M. Wilson, Norfolk County, Va., Oct. 10, 1861
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Wilson, Samuel. M.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Broadside, announcing himself to be a "candidate at the approaching election, to represent you in the Congress of the Confederate States ..."
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Tracy W. McGregor Library, American History Collection. McGregor Endowment Fund, 2009/2010.
